author: Simon Difford
description: Forgo the ice cream and try this creamy, quaffable, alcoholic dessert.
name: Rum & Raisin Alexandra
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
